`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-ts",children:`import { components } from "theme/components";
import { foundations } from "./foundations";
import { createTheme, ThemeOptions } from "@mui/material";

const themeOptions: Omit<ThemeOptions, "components"> = {
  ...foundations,
};

export const theme: ThemeOptions = createTheme({
  ...themeOptions,
  components: {
    ...components,
  },
});

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-ts",children:`declare module "@mui/material/Button" {
  export interface ButtonPropsVariantOverrides {
    isActive: true;
  }
}

export const MuiButton: muiButton = {
  variants: [
    {
      props: { variant: "isActive" },
      style: ({ theme }: { theme: Theme }) => {
        return {
          color: theme.palette.common.white,
        };
      },
    },
  ],
};
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b8be3293-eab1-440c-a885-793697eaf337.mdx",lineNumber:143,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-b8be3293-eab1-440c-a885-793697eaf337.mdx",lineNumber:143,columnNumber:1},this),`
